Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the soundtrack of the movie 'Kaal'?
Options:
A. a) The song 'Aankhiyan Teriya Ve' is part of the 'KaalSoundtrack' album.
B. b) Salim–Sulaiman collaborated with Anand Raj Anand on the 'KaalSoundtrack'.
C. c) 'KaalSoundtrack' features music by only Anand Raj Anand.
D. d) Salim–Sulaiman is one of the composers for the 'KaalSoundtrack'.
Answer: a) The song 'Aankhiyan Teriya Ve' is part of the 'KaalSoundtrack' album., b) Salim–Sulaiman collaborated with Anand Raj Anand on the 'KaalSoundtrack', d) Salim–Sulaiman is one of the composers for the 'KaalSoundtrack'.

Options:

C. c) Shankar Mahadevan provided vocals for a medley in the album.
D. d) 'Aankhiyan Teriya Ve' was sung by Shankar Mahadevan.
Answer: a) 'Aankhiyan Teriya Ve' is a song included in the album., b) Salim–Sulaiman composed the *Kaal Soundtrack*., c) Shankar Mahadevan provided vocals for a medley in the album.
